file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  title: "Coronavirus FAQ API"
  version: "2.0.0"
  license:
    name: "Public domain; CC0 1.0 Universal public domain dedication"
    url: "https://github.com/18F/cv_faq/blob/master/LICENSE.md"

servers:
  - url: "https://faq.coronavirus.gov/api/v2"
    description: "v2 production"

paths:
  /questions.json:
    get:
      summary: "Retreives all questions with their answers."
      responses:
        200:
          description: "OK"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Question'
  /categories.json:
    get:
      summary: "Retrieves all question categories."
      responses:
        200:
          description: "OK"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: "array"
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Category'

components:
  schemas:
    Category:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        category_url:
          type: "string"
          format: "uri"
        title:
          type: "string"
    Question:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        question_url:
          type: "string"
          format: "uri"
        title:
          type: "string"
        answer:
          type: "string"
        answer_html:
          type: "string"
        updated_at:
          type: "string"
          format: "date"
        categories:
          type: "array"
          items:
            type: "object"
            properties:
              title:
                type: "string"
              category_url:
                type: "string"
                format: "uri"
        sources:
          type: "array"
          items:
            type: "object"
            properties:
              agency:
                type: "string"
              url:
                type: "string"
                format: "uri"
